meanings.definition: Involving many carefully arranged parts or details; detailed and complicated.
meanings.sent1: The elaborate cake had intricate designs and many layers.
meanings.sent2: She wore an elaborate dress to the party.
meanings.sent3: The elaborate puzzle took hours to complete.
meanings.sent4: The elaborate plan to surprise her worked perfectly.
meanings.sent5: The elaborate painting captured every tiny detail beautifully.

meanings.definition: To develop or present in detail.
meanings.sent1: He asked her to elaborate on her idea during the meeting.
meanings.sent2: The author will elaborate on the plot in the next chapter.
meanings.sent3: She decided to elaborate on her story with more interesting characters.
meanings.sent4: The teacher asked the student to elaborate on his answer.
meanings.sent5: The chef will elaborate on the recipe during the cooking show.

meanings.definition: To add more detail or information to something.
meanings.sent1: Can you elaborate on the instructions for me?
meanings.sent2: She will elaborate on the project during the presentation.
meanings.sent3: He likes to elaborate on his stories with funny anecdotes.
meanings.sent4: The scientist will elaborate on the findings in the research paper.
meanings.sent5: Please elaborate on your reasons for choosing that option.
